sql.query:
SELECT task_type, task_id, visa_info_id, country, visa_type, status
FROM task_assigned
WHERE task_assigned_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.task_assigned_id}} */

SELECT default_task.task_name
FROM task_assigned
LEFT JOIN default_task AS default_task ON (default_task.default_task_id = task_assigned.task_id)
WHERE task_assigned.task_assigned_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.task_assigned_id}} */ AND task_assigned.user_id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */

UPDATE task_assigned
SET status = :P1 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, updated_on = :P2 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE task_assigned_id = :P3 /* {{$_POST.task_assigned_id}} */

values.value: {{'Your task "'+GetTask.task_name+'" status updated from "'+GetTaskDetails.status+'" to  "'+$_POST.status+'", visa type "'+GetTaskDetails.visa_type+'" and visiting country "'+GetTaskDetails.country+'".'}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO notifications
(user_id, application_id, notif_type, notif_name, notif_details, notif_link) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetTaskDetails.visa_info_id}} */, :P3 /* {{'Linked'}} */, :P4 /* {{'Task Status Updated'}} */, :P5 /* {{'Your task "'+GetTask.task_name+'" status updated from "'+GetTaskDetails.status+'" to  "'+$_POST.status+'", visa type "'+GetTaskDetails.visa_type+'" and visiting country "'+GetTaskDetails.country+'".'}} */, :P6 /* {{'https://'+$_SERVER.SERVER_NAME+'/portal/tasks'}} */)

params.name: :P5
params.value: {{'Your task "'+GetTask.task_name+'" status updated from "'+GetTaskDetails.status+'" to  "'+$_POST.status+'", visa type "'+GetTaskDetails.visa_type+'" and visiting country "'+GetTaskDetails.country+'".'}}

sql.query:
SELECT country, visa_type
FROM custom_task
WHERE custom_task_id = :P1 /* {{GetTaskDetails.task_id}} */

UPDATE custom_task
SET country = :P1 /* {{GetCustomDetails.country}} */, visa_type = :P2 /* {{GetCustomDetails.visa_type}} */, task_name = :P3 /* {{$_POST.task_name}} */, required = :P4 /* {{$_POST.required}} */, description = :P5 /* {{$_POST.description}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE custom_task_id = :P7 /* {{GetTaskDetails.task_id}} */

UPDATE task_assigned
SET status = :P1 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, updated_on = :P2 /* {{NOW}} */, country = :P3 /* {{GetCustomDetails.country}} */, visa_type = :P4 /* {{GetCustomDetails.visa_type}} */
WHERE task_assigned_id = :P5 /* {{$_POST.task_assigned_id}} */

values.value: {{'Your custom task "'+GetTaskDetails.task_name+'" status updated from "'+GetTaskDetails.status+'" to  "'+$_POST.status+'", visa type "'+GetTaskDetails.visa_type+'" and visiting country "'+GetTaskDetails.country+'".'}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO notifications
(user_id, application_id, notif_type, notif_name, notif_details, notif_link) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetTaskDetails.visa_info_id}} */, :P3 /* {{'Linked'}} */, :P4 /* {{'Custom Task Updated'}} */, :P5 /* {{'Your custom task "'+GetTaskDetails.task_name+'" status updated from "'+GetTaskDetails.status+'" to  "'+$_POST.status+'", visa type "'+GetTaskDetails.visa_type+'" and visiting country "'+GetTaskDetails.country+'".'}} */, :P6 /* {{'https://'+$_SERVER.SERVER_NAME+'/portal/tasks'}} */)

params.name: :P5
params.value: {{'Your custom task "'+GetTaskDetails.task_name+'" status updated from "'+GetTaskDetails.status+'" to  "'+$_POST.status+'", visa type "'+GetTaskDetails.visa_type+'" and visiting country "'+GetTaskDetails.country+'".'}}

sql.query:
SELECT visa_info_id, destination_country, visa_application_type
FROM visa_info
WHERE visa_info_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.visa_info_id}} */

INSERT INTO custom_task
(user_id, country, visa_type, task_name, required, description, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetVisaInfo.destination_country}} */, :P3 /* {{GetVisaInfo.visa_application_type}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.task_name}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.required}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.description}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */)

SELECT custom_task_id
FROM custom_task
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */
ORDER BY custom_task_id DESC

INSERT INTO task_assigned
(user_id, country, visa_type, task_id, task_type, status, created_on, visa_info_id) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetVisaInfo.destination_country}} */, :P3 /* {{GetVisaInfo.visa_application_type}} */, :P4 /* {{GetCustomId.custom_task_id}} */, :P5 /* {{'Custom'}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.visa_info_id}} */)

values.value: {{'You have created a new custom task "'+$_POST.task_name+'", task status is "'+$_POST.status+'", visa type "'+GetVisaInfo.visa_application_type+'" and visiting country "'+GetVisaInfo.destination_country+'".'}}
